tool_description: Manages outreach to volunteer applicant references including scheduling calls, sending questionnaires, and tracking response status across multiple reference contacts.

applicant_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer applicant

reference_contacts.description: List of reference contact information (name, phone, email, relationship)

contact_method.description: Preferred method of reference contact (phone, email, online_form)

reference_questions.description: List of questions to ask references

error_messages: Insufficient references: Provide at least 2 reference contacts
Invalid contact method: Use one of [phone, email, online_form]
Missing contact information: Each reference must include name, phone/email, and relationship
Deadline in past: Reference deadline must be a future date
Empty questions list: Provide at least one question for references
usage: Submit applicant reference contacts with preferred contact method and questions to initiate systematic reference checking process.

outreach_id.description: Unique identifier for this reference outreach campaign

expected_completion.description: Estimated date for reference collection completion

contact_status.description: Status of each reference contact attempt
